rules_text: When Faithful Seasteed enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a card named Faithful Seasteed, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
notes:
WU:
 - Five or more artifacts
 - Metalcraft
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
WB:
 - triggered abilities
 - flicker
RW:
 - MV 3 or less
 - Shipwright
